word:
33. Stephen Belden 

     [W. C. WHITE STATEMENT: "SISTER WHITE DID NOT SYMPATHIZE WITH THOSE WHO TOOK THE GROUND THAT A PERSON WHO HAD SEPARATED FROM A COMPANION ON OTHER THAN  SCRIPTURAL GROUND, AND MARRIED AGAIN, THAT THIS SECOND MARRIAGE MUST BE BROKEN UP IF THEY WERE TO BE ACCEPTED OR RETAINED IN AN SDA CHURCH.
